title: Ep. 64 "How To Make A Lust Connection" ft. Mike Greene
description:
Ladies and gents remember to thank us after you listen to this week's episode of how to please whoever you're f**king! A lot of y'all are out here doing grown folk activities and you actually have no clue what you're doing or how to do it to please your partner. So have your pens and notebooks ready! We brought on Mike Greene from L Love Connection to help us help you!
